Desc.entry: Kyogikan School of Aikido is a full time, purpose built aikido dojo which enjoys the only full time instruction for shodokan aikido in the UK. The school aims to provide effective self defence for women, as well as all aspects of aikido including weapons training for adults. Also teaches Shotokan karate.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Please telephone for details of days and times

category.entry: MARTIAL ARTS - AIKIDO, IAIDO, JUDO AND JU-JITSU
